results.title: Product Terms
results.content: CAL and ML Equivalency Licenses Notices Professional Services Program Agreement Supplemental Terms Promotions Software Assurance Benefits Azure Hardware Terms Amazon Workspaces Deployments Student Use Benefits and Academic Programs Microsoft Security portfolio Product Terms mapping. Includes Core CAL, Enterprise CAL, and associated Bridge CALs. Includes Azure FXT Filer, Advanced Threat Analytics, BizTalk, Core Infrastructure Server, Identity Manager, and System Center products. Includes all Microsoft Dynamics 365 On-premises offers. Includes Office Desktop Applications, Suites, and Office for Mac. Includes Exchange, Project, SharePoint, and Skype for Business Server. Includes Virtual Desktop Infrastructure suite. Includes all Windows Desktop OS offers. Includes all Enterprise Mobility + Security suites. Includes all Microsoft 365 Suites and offers. Includes Azure Services, User, Infrastructure, and Support Plans. Includes all Microsoft Dynamics 365 Services offers. Includes all Office 365 Services offers. Includes Bing Maps, GitHub Offerings, Cloud App Security, Microsoft Cloud Healthcare Add-on, Microsoft Defender, Intune, Microsoft Learning, Microsoft 365 Defender, Minecraft: Education, Office 365 Developer, and Visual Studio with GitHub Enterprise.
